pma:database.name: wmdhs
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `department_info` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `dept_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '', `dept_info` longtext NOT NULL, `news` text NOT NULL, `resources` text NOT NULL, `puzzle` text NOT NULL, `unused` tinyint(4) NOT NULL default '0', `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP on update CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `dept_id` (`dept_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: department_info
table.column:
Objectives of the Department

The courses in mathematics emphasize the pattern, structure, and unifying ideas of the discipline. Since we have witnessed tremendous growth in uses of mathematics during the past thirty years, it is virtually impossible to predict all our future mathematical needs. We attempt to provide opportunities for students to achieve the mathematical, statistical, and computer literacy that will be required by tomorrow's society. Problem-solving skills are one of the major emphases of our program.

  • The Cool Math site contains useful links to a lot of other interesting math sites.

  • Get your math puzzles here!

  • The history of math provides a useful context that can inform and enliven what you’re learning.
